title: Influence of Ru-Substitution on the Performance of Pyrochlore Catalysts in Oxidative Steam Reforming of Ethanol
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01585H, Paper
Yu-Hsuan Huang, Ho-Chen Hsieh, Yun-Hsin Wang, Sheng-Feng Weng, Chi-Shen Lee
The oxidative steam reforming of ethanol was conducted using a range of Ru-substituted pyrochlore catalysts, La2Zr2-xRuxO7-δ (LZRO00 - 04, x = 0.0–0.4), synthesized through a sol-gel process. Each sample underwent...
